data.title: Welcome to King AI Studio
data.content:
# Welcome to King AI Studio

This is your self-expanding AI system for King Holdings.

## Features
- **Document Hub**: Store and manage all your documents, SOPs, and contracts
- **Compliance Module**: Track filings, deadlines, and regulatory requirements
- **Contracts & AR**: Manage contracts and accounts receivable

## Daily Summaries
You'll receive a daily summary at 6 PM Chicago time with:
- Tasks completed today
- Questions for tomorrow
- Pre-approval propositions

## Approval System
- ✅ Most tasks auto-approve
- ⏳ Legal and financial tasks require your approval via email

---
